verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed מַשְׂכִּ֣יל <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil [is] he that considereth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about דָּ֑ל <S%H1800><s%> Dal; the poor בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom him in time רָ֝עָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, of trouble יְֽמַלְּטֵ֥הוּ <S%H4422><s%> ye-mal-le-Te-hu will deliver יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִשְׁמְרֵ֣הוּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-me-Re-hu will preserve וִֽ֭יחַיֵּהוּ <S%H2421><s%> Vi-chai-ye-hu him and keep him alive; יֶאְשֹּׁר ye'sh-shor כוְאֻשַּׁ֣ר <S%H833><s%> ve-'ush-Shar call קבָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; upon the earth וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תִּ֝תְּנֵ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-te-Ne-hu, and thou wilt not deliver בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> be-Ne-fesh him unto the will אֹיְבָֽיו׃ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vav. of his enemies

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD יִ֭סְעָדֶנּוּ <S%H5582><s%> Yis-'a-den-nu will strengthen עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon עֶ֣רֶשׂ <S%H6210><s%> 'E-res him upon the bed דְּוָ֑י <S%H1741><s%> de-Vai; of languishing כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מִ֝שְׁכָּב֗וֹ <S%H4904><s%> mish-ka-Vo, all his bed הָפַ֥כְתָּ <S%H2015><s%> ha-Fach-ta thou wilt make בְחָלְיֽוֹ׃ <S%H2483><s%> ve-chal-Yo. in his sickness

אֲ‍ ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> 'ani- I אָ֭מַרְתִּי <S%H559><s%> 'A-mar-ti I said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD חָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni be merciful רְפָאָ֥ה <S%H7495><s%> re-fa-'Ah unto me heal נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my soul כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for חָטָ֥אתִי <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-ti for I have sinned לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

אוֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai, Mine enemies יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru speak רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> ra' evil לִ֑י Li; מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai When יָ֝מ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> ya-Mut, of me When shall he die וְאָבַ֥ד <S%H6><s%> ve-'a-Vad perish שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. and his name

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- and when בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba And if he come לִרְא֨וֹת׀ <S%H7200><s%> lir-'ot to see שָׁ֤וְא <S%H7723><s%> shav vanity יְדַבֵּ֗ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber, [me] he speaketh לִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo, his heart יִקְבָּץ־ <S%H6908><s%> yik-botz- gathereth אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven iniquity ל֑וֹ lo; יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze to itself [when] he goeth לַח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> la-Chutz abroad יְדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber. he telleth

יַ֗חַד <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad, together עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against יִ֭תְלַחֲשׁוּ <S%H3907><s%> Yit-la-cha-shu me whisper כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All שֹׂנְאָ֑י <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ai; All that hate עָלַ֓י׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai Against יַחְשְׁב֖וּ <S%H2803><s%> yach-she-Vu against me against me do they devise רָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah my hurt לִֽי׃ Li.

דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- disease בְּ֭לִיַּעַל <S%H1100><s%> Be-li-ya-'al An evil יָצ֣וּק <S%H3332><s%> ya-Tzuk [say they] cleaveth fast בּ֑וֹ bo; וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher when שָׁ֝כַ֗ב <S%H7901><s%> Chav, unto him and [now] that he lieth לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sif no more לָקֽוּם׃ <S%H6965><s%> la-Kum. he shall rise up

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Even אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish friend שְׁלוֹמִ֨י׀ <S%H7965><s%> she-lo-Mi Yea mine own familiar אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom בָּטַ֣חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> ba-Tach-ti in whom I trusted ב֭וֹ vo אוֹכֵ֣ל <S%H398><s%> o-Chel which did eat לַחְמִ֑י <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mi; of my bread הִגְדִּ֖יל <S%H1431><s%> hig-Dil hath lifted up עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against עָקֵֽב׃ <S%H6119><s%> 'a-Kev. [his] heel

וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God חָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni be merciful וַהֲקִימֵ֑נִי <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ki-Me-ni; unto me and raise me up וַֽאֲשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <S%H7999><s%> va-'a-shal-le-Mah that I may requite לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem. like

בְּזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> be-Zot I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Ya-da'-ti By this I know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because חָפַ֣צְתָּ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fatz-ta that thou favourest בִּ֑י Bi; כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יָרִ֖יעַ <S%H7321><s%> ya-Ri-a' doth not triumph אֹיְבִ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vi me because mine enemy עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. over

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni, I בְּ֭תֻמִּי <S%H8537><s%> Be-tum-mi me in mine integrity תָּמַ֣כְתָּ <S%H8551><s%> ta-Mach-ta And as for me thou upholdest בִּ֑י Bi; וַתַּצִּיבֵ֖נִי <S%H5324><s%> vat-tatz-tzi-Ve-ni and settest לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha me before thy face לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. for ever

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [be] the LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵֽ֭הָעוֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> Me-ha-'o-lom from everlasting וְעַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> ve-'Ad against הָעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> ha-'o-Lam, and to everlasting אָ֘מֵ֥ן׀ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> ve-'a-Men. and Amen
